definitions.definition: A member of the family Coronaviridae , comprising viruses which infect animals and human beings , and the genome of which consists of a single strand of RNA .

subdefinitions.definition: SARS-CoV-2 , the specific coronavirus that causes the infectious disease COVID-19 .

definitions.definition: An illness caused by a coronavirus.

subdefinitions.definition: COVID-19 , the disease caused by the specific coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 .

main_definition: ( virology ) A member of the family Coronaviridae , comprising viruses which infect animals and human beings , and the genome of which consists of a single strand of RNA . [from 1968]
secondary_definitions: ( metonymic ) An illness caused by a coronavirus.
